bug.author: jinfagang
bug.summary: Libs can not download from China when compile from source
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>ERROR: An error occurred during the fetch of repository 'org_sqlite': java.io.IOException: Error downloading [http://mirror.tensorflow.org/www.sqlite.org/2019/sqlite-amalgamation-3280000.zip, https://www.sqlite.org/2019/sqlite-amalgamation-3280000.zip] to /home/jintian/.cache/bazel/_bazel_jintian/879bdee779be1c04fff5ab7e8f48b925/external/org_sqlite/sqlite-amalgamation-3280000.zip: All mirrors are down: [connect timed out]
</denchmark-code>
this url is blocked inside china, why using this download when compile? why not just make it --recursive when clone?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jinfagang>@jinfagang</denchmark-link> Could you please provide the exact sequence of commands / steps that you executed before running into the problem.Thanks!
